title: Five new Steam games you probably missed (February 13, 2023)

title: Rebuild after Ragnarok in roguelike city-builder Roots of Yggdrasil

title: EA Originals to publish more big-budget games as well as small indies

description: When there was but one set of footprints in the sand, that was Dagoth Ur carrying you.

title: Dark Souls 3 joins the growing list of games with fun Unreal Engine 5 mockups

description: Atelier Marie has never been available outside of Japan.

title: Resident Evil 4 is partying like it's 2011 with a deluge of day-one DLC

description: Here's a Wordle hint to help you out and the full answer if you need it.

title: Total War: Warhammer 3 DLC planned for April release

title: Fatshark details upcoming changes to Darktide's gear acquisition and crafting
description: I wouldn't mind if they scrapped the crafting entirely.
